subject: Server is down
body: Server is down, all services are offline! Engineers have been paged but no one has responded yet. Multiple customers are reporting issues.

subject: Critical security vulnerability detected
body: A critical security vulnerability has been detected in production. We need to patch this immediately before it can be exploited.

subject: Customer data breach reported
body: Customer data breach reported. Immediate action needed to contain the breach and notify affected users per GDPR requirements.

subject: Payment system failure
body: The payment system has failed and all transactions are currently blocked. Finance team has been alerted.

subject: Emergency meeting about the outage
body: Join emergency meeting in 10 minutes to discuss the ongoing production outage. Bridge line details attached.
